description: Astral knows river guides (and water lovers) need gear that won’t fail. The problem is most sandals are too bulky and don’t have enough traction. Well, let them introduce the first-ever PFD Sandal! They took the webbing and adjustable straps from their award-winning PFDs and combined them with their trusted Loyak outsole, providing demanding users Balanced Geometry™ for comfort and balance, and a glove-like fit for even the most precarious positions.
name: Astral PFD Sandal - Mens
